term.title: microgel

item.text: Particle of gel of any shape with an equivalent diameter of approximately 0.1 to 100 µm.

notes.item: The definition proposed here is recommended for its precision and because it distinguishes between a microgel and a nanogel.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1807 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
